xwikidoc.name: InvitationDocumentBundle
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
#---------------------------------------------------------------------- # Translations for Invitation Application #---------------------------------------------------------------------- admin.invitation=Invitation Application xe.invitation.heading=Email Invitation Messenger xe.invitation.userIsReportedSpammer=A message which you sent was reported as spam and your privilege to send mail has suspended pending investigation, we apologize for the inconvenience. xe.invitation.returnToMainPage=Return to the main page xe.invitation.configInfo=This document contains configuration for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.emailContainerInfo=This document contains email messages for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.emailClassInfo=This document contains the class definition for email message XObjects for the [[invitation application>>XWiki.Invitation]] xe.invitation.onlyMembersCanSendMail=Sorry, only members of this wiki can send mail. xe.invitation.youAreAMemberOfOtherWiki=You seem to be a member of {0} which is a different wiki. xe.invitation.toLabel=To: xe.invitation.subjectLabel=Subject: xe.invitation.contentLabel=Message: xe.invitation.previewLabel=Preview: xe.invitation.errorWhileSending=An error has occurred while sending the message. xe.invitation.successSending=Your message has been sent. xe.invitation.messageSentLogEntry=Message sent xe.invitation.noValidMessagesToSend=Your message couldn't be sent because there were no valid email addresses to send to. xe.invitation.noMessageFound=No message found by that id. xe.invitation.guestsCanNotJoin=Invitations can not be accepted because this wiki is closed. To allow invitees to join, save [[{0}]] as a user with Programming Rights.
xe.invitation.emailContent.subjectLine={0} has invited you to join {1} {2} xe.invitation.emailContent.userHasInvitedYouToJoinWiki=You have received this mail because {0} has invited you to join {1}. xe.invitation.emailContent.joinLink=Accept the invitation and join xe.invitation.emailContent.declineLink=Decline # reportMessage expects the opening link tag to be passed as the parameter. xe.invitation.emailContent.reportMessage=If this message looks like abuse of our system, please {0}report it{1}
xe.invitation.sendMail.addMessageSaveComment=Added Email Message.
xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.heading=Inspect sent message xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.noMessageFound=No message by this id was found. xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.reportedAsSpam=Reported as spam xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.waitingToBeInvestigated=Waiting to be investigated xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.viewMessage=View Message xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.sentBy=Sent by: xe.invitation.displayOldMessage.markThisMessageAsInvestigated=Mark this message as investigated.
xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.status=Message Status xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.viewMessagesSentByUsers=View messages sent by users xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.sender=Sender xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.subject=Subject xe.invitation.displayAllOldMessages.memo=Notes:
xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.sentDate=Date xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.sendingUser=Sender xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.subjectLine=Subject xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.status=Status xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.memo=Memo xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.recipient=Email xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.history=Message History xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.showHistory=Show History xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.multipleRecipients={0} Recipients xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.various=<various> xe.invitation.displayMessageTable.noMessages=No messages to display
xe.invitation.displayMessageTableInForm.buttonLabel.cancel=Cancel xe.invitation.displayMessageTableInForm.buttonLabel.notSpam=Mark as not spam
xe.invitation.doAction.confirmLabel=Confirm xe.invitation.doAction.lackingPermission=You do not have permission to do this action. xe.invitation.doAction.invitationCanceledMemo={0} left you this message when canceling the invitation. xe.invitation.doAction.invalidStatus=This request cannot be processed because the status of this invitation is {0}.
xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.heading=Report Abuse xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.noMessageFound=There was no message found by the given ID. Maybe an administrator deleted the message from our system. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.success=Your report has been logged and the situation will be investigated as soon as possible, we apologize for the inconvenience. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.reportSaveComment=Reported message as spam. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.areYouSure=Are you sure you would like to report this message as abuse. xe.invitation.doAction.reportSpam.memoLabel=Note to the administrator who investigates this report (optional)
xe.invitation.doAction.accept.heading=Accept invitation xe.invitation.doAction.accept.saveComment=Invitation accepted. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.noMessageFound=No message was found by that ID, maybe it was deleted accidentally or the system is experiencing problems. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.invitationCanceled=We're sorry but this invitation has been canceled. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.alreadyReportedAsSpam=This invitation has been reported as spam and is no longer valid. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.alreadyDeclined=This invitation has been declined and cannot be accepted now. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.alreadyAccepted=This invitation has already been accepted and the offer is no longer valid. xe.invitation.doAction.accept.improperConfiguration=This invitation cannot be accepted because the wiki is not configured to allow new users.
xe.invitation.doAction.decline.heading=Decline invitation xe.invitation.doAction.decline.memoLabel=Message to {0} (optional) xe.invitation.doAction.decline.confirmLabel=Decline invitation xe.invitation.doAction.decline.saveComment=Invitation Declined xe.invitation.doAction.decline.alreadyReportedAsSpam=This invitation has already been reported as spam and thus cannot be declined. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.invitationCanceled=This invitation has been canceled and thus cannot be declined. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.alreadyDeclined=This invitation has already been declined and cannot be declined again. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.alreadyAccepted=This invitation has already been accepted and now cannot be declined. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.noMessageFound=No invitation was found by the given ID. It might have been deleted or maybe the system is experiencing difficulties. xe.invitation.doAction.decline.success=This invitation has successfully been declined.
xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.notPossibleOnMultipleMessages=This action is not possible on multiple messages. xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.confirmLabel=Confirm xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.noMessagesFound=No messages were found by the ids given. xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.noMessagesAffected=This action cannot be carried out because all of the messages selected are of the wrong status.
xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.notSpam.successMessage=Invitation successfully marked as not spam. Log entry: {0} xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.notSpam.heading=Mark message as not spam or situation handled. xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.notSpam.memoLabel=Synopsis of findings and/or action taken xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.notSpam.confirmLabel=Return email privilege xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.notSpam.reportHandledSaveComment={0} investigated spam report.
xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.heading=Cancel invitations xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.saveComment={0} invitations were canceled by {1} xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.success=Invitation successfully canceled. xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.memoLabel=Leave a message in case the invitee(s) try to register. xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.someMessagesNotFound={0} of the {1} messages to cancel could not be found. xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.areYouSure.OneMessage=Are you sure you want to cancel this invitation? xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.areYouSure.OneMessagePerGroup=Are you sure you want to cancel these {0} invitations? xe.invitation.doUserActionOnMultipleMessages.cancel.areYouSure.multipleMessagesMultipleGroups=Are you sure you want to cancel these {0} invitations to {1} recipients?
xe.invitation.displayMessage.anAddressesIsInvalid=One of the given email addresses is invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayMessage.someAddressesAreInvalid={0} of the given email addresses are invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayMessage.theAddressIsInvalid=The email address given is invalid and will not be sent to. xe.invitation.displayForm.sendMail=Send Mail xe.invitation.displayForm.backToEdit=Back To Edit xe.invitation.displayForm.preview=Preview
xe.invitation.tools.heading=Tools xe.invitation.tools.myInvitationsLink=My invitations xe.invitation.tools.invitationsInGroup=Invitations in this message group xe.invitation.tools.invitationHistory=History of this invitation xe.invitation.tools.senderLink=Invite friends
xe.invitation.adminTools.heading=Administrative Tools xe.invitation.adminTools.configureLink=Configure the invitation application xe.invitation.adminTools.allInvitationsLink=View all invitations
xe.invitation.configuration.smtpHeading=SMTP Settings:

xe.invitation.messageStatus.unsent=Unsent xe.invitation.messageStatus.pending=Pending xe.invitation.messageStatus.accepted=Accepted xe.invitation.messageStatus.declined=Declined xe.invitation.messageStatus.canceled=Canceled xe.invitation.messageStatus.reported=Reported as spam xe.invitation.messageStatus.investigated=Spam report investigated xe.invitation.messageStatus.unknown=Unknown status ({0}) xe.invitation.messageStatus.sendingFailed=Failed to send message

# XWiki.InvitationMail (Invitation Application) Email XObject Invitation.InvitationMailClass_messageID=Email message identifier Invitation.InvitationMailClass_messageGroupID=Message group identifier Invitation.InvitationMailClass_recipient=Email address which this message was sent to Invitation.InvitationMailClass_sendingUser=User who sent the message Invitation.InvitationMailClass_subjectLine=Subject line Invitation.InvitationMailClass_messageBody=Message content Invitation.InvitationMailClass_statusCode=Number indicating the message status Invitation.InvitationMailClass_memo=Memo attached to this message
# XWiki.WebHome (Invitation application) Configuration Invitation.WebHome_from_address=Email "from" address Invitation.WebHome_smtp_server_password=Smtp password Invitation.WebHome_smtp_server_username=Smtp username Invitation.WebHome_smtp_port=Smtp port Invitation.WebHome_smtp_server=Smtp server host name Invitation.WebHome_javamail_extra_props=Javamail extra properties Invitation.WebHome_subjectLineTemplate=Email subject line template Invitation.WebHome_messageBodyTemplate=Email message body HTML template Invitation.WebHome_messageBodyTemplatePlain=Message body plain text template Invitation.WebHome_emailClass=Email message XClass Invitation.WebHome_emailContainer=Document containing email XObjects Invitation.WebHome_emailRegex=Regular expression for validating email addresses Invitation.WebHome_allowUsersOfOtherWikis=Let users of other wikis send Invitation.WebHome_usersMayPersonalizeMessage=Let users personalize messages Invitation.WebHome_usersMaySendToMultiple=Let users send to multiple addresses
